content: When adding fixed values to a CodeableConcept, with enabled "is pattern" in Forge the outcome is different then expected.

It is generating a fixed uri on code.system, and a patternCode element. Which is not was i expected to get when activating this checkbox.
I expected a patternCodeableConcept here, as this is (my) most frequent use-case.
Hi @Patrick Werner You would expect Forge to create a patternCodeableConcept when you put 'is pattern' on a CodeableConcept level. We will look in to this! Thank you for pointing this out.
Exactly. Would be a huge improvement. Using it right now has hardly any use-case.
